statusLegend.met: Objective validated within agreed gate and evidence captured.
statusLegend.not_met: Objective measured and gate failed; follow-up required.
statusLegend.not_measured: Measurement pending because enabling automation is not yet in place.
statusLegend.waived: Formal waiver approved (recorded with expiry and mitigation).

objectives.target: 100% pass for Register → Verify → Login → Plan → Complete → Analytics Export
objectives.notes: Baseline awaits end-to-end flow automation and summary generator.

objectives.target: ≥80% lines & branches repo-wide; ≥90% on auth/session/points critical code
auth ≤200 ms, crud ≤300 ms, feed ≤400 ms, analytics ≤600 ms; ≤10% regression
objectives.gate: k6 grouped scenario comparison vs tests/perf/baselines/main.json
objectives.notes: Requires grouped k6 suite and baseline artifact.

objectives.target: /health returns 200 in ≤5 s from container start
objectives.notes: Startup probe for backend container still to be scripted.

objectives.target: Request body ≤2 MB; response body ≤1 MB; gzip/Brotli for >1 KB
objectives.notes: Need contract tests to enforce payload budgets.

objectives.target: No PII in logs/metrics/labels (lint & sample scan)
objectives.notes: Log sampling and lint automation not yet committed.

objectives.target: LCP P75 < 2.5 s (mid-tier 4G); ≤5 API calls on first paint (key screens)
objectives.notes: Requires Lighthouse CI wiring and Playwright network budgets.

objectives.target: WCAG 2.1 AA; axe/Lighthouse score ≥90 (Auth, Planner, Logger, Dashboard)
0 High/Critical SCA; ZAP baseline no High; SBOM per build; images signed & pinned
objectives.gate: SCA & ZAP reports, SBOM, cosign verify log
objectives.notes: Security automation hooks yet to run in CI.

objectives.target: DSR export/delete ≤30 days; backup purge ≤14 days
objectives.notes: Requires DSR E2E automation and DR reporting.

objectives.target: Tokens contract passes; visual diff ≤0.2% on critical pages (light/dark × xs/sm/md/lg)
objectives.notes: Visual regression suite pending baseline generation.
